Title: The Lord of War and Thunder
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Gary Lennon, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Wendy Calhoun (executive story editor), Chris Provenzano (executive story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan's surveillance job on a fugitive is interrupted when he is forced to deal with his troubled father, who is causing mischief for a drug dealer who is renting from him.
